item.title: NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani keeps Trump 'fascist' label after White House meeting
item.description: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is standing by his description of President Trump as a "fascist."

item.title: JFK's granddaughter reveals terminal cancer diagnosis, criticizes cousin RFK Jr.

item.title: Slotkin calls Trump's threat 'inappropriate' over debate on illegal military orders

item.title: MTG hits reports she is considering running for president after announcing resignation plans
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene is slapping down reports that she is considering a 2028 presidential run, calling the speculation "a complete lie."
